title: Double-Angle, Half-Angle, and Reduction Formulas
body: For the following exercises, find the exact values of a) sin(2x), b) cos(2x), and c) tan(2x) without solving for $$x$$. Write your answers in the order a,b,c with commas and no spaces. Do not input decimal answers. If you have a square root, write $$\sqrt{x}$$ where $$x$$ is the value you are square rooting.
